page.title: 14COMMUNICATIONS IN NW PENRITH
page.content: 70% of the people in this area have telephones.It is the most popular communication system in the area. There is a telephone box in Newton Reigny and a telephone box in Catterlen.The red phone boxes,are being replaced by British Telecoms microprocessor units. These "Blue Payphones" have a push-button keypad and take all coins from 10p upwards.This year B.T is going to install Light-Lines(Glass Fibre 'phone links) & my dad is going on a course for this.The area is up to date with new digital-technology system-X exchanges which provide better and faster call set-up.There is also a sub-Post Office in Newton Reigny(but n not in Catterlen)which people use for Pensions,Family Allowances,& stamps. The Post Office van comes once a day, in the villages.
